divs: sighting detailsthis evening, i kept hearing crashing sounds on the roof, it's already dark here and there is a lot of snow\ice on the roof. i went out to make sure my roof was ok, unfortunately, i was not able to see much on the roof, but i happened to look up and there was an object in the sky. not moving, no sound, with lights flashing in a continuous circular motion. the night sky was clear to the east, a lot of stars, but this was not a star. i saw a plane flying from the west heading east toward this object, the next thing i know, the lights went out on the object. it was over my home, so there is no way i can see it from the windows. i live close to the 35 bypass and 42.
Summary: Circular with lights flashing in circles
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Xenia
There were no other sightings in Xenia on or around February 14th 2007
